preparingVideo: ⏳ Preparing the video, it will take no more than a minute
preparingLink: ⏳ Processing the link, it will take no more than a minute
containsManyLinks: 🔗 The link contains multiple media files. Please select which one you'd like to download:
linksFound: ✅ Link successfully processed! Click to download:
beforeUpload: 📥 While we're uploading the video to Telegram, you can use the following link for a quick download 👇
tooLargeSize:
The file size is too large for uploading to Telegram(
Please use the button above 👆
incorrectLink:
❌ Failed to parse the link(
Something might be wrong with the file...
clickTheLink: 👇 ***Click the link*** to start the download:
uploadToTg: ⌛ Alternatively, you can click the button, and we will upload the video to Telegram, ***but it may take longer***
TweetUnavailable: 🔒 Unfortunately, this tweet is protected and unavailable for viewing
clickToDownload: ⬇️ Click the link to download the video:
feedbackExample:
Here you can send a message to the developer! 👤
Think carefully, express your thought fully, and fit it into one message ✍️

Below are examples of different types of feedback you can send:
- Hi! I would like to suggest adding feature X, which would allow us to do Y 📈
- Hi! I noticed a bug in function X when I do Y 🛠
feedbackReceived:
✉️ Feedback received!
You can continue using the bot 🚀
smthWentWrong: ❌ Oops, something went wrong. Please try again.
botWokeUpTechIssues:
Hey! 👋
Technical issues have been resolved 🛠✅
You can use the bot again 🚀
botWokeUp:
⚡️ ***Update*** ⚡️

💡 Added support for ***TikTok links!***
🛠 Additionally, minor bugs with Twitter links have been fixed. You can try re-uploading the links that had errors
